With easy access to the N/Q lines at Broadway and the R/M lines at Steinway, you'll be just 20 minutes away from Midtown.

details.description:
----- Luxury 2 bedroom 1bath, available now ------
Housed in what was formerly known as the Empire State Dairy Company, The Highland is one of Brooklyn?s most recent landmarked buildings. Steeped in rich history, The residence now spans 14 stories and offers Studio, 1, 2, and 3 bedroom homes.
Our units feature ? Modern Elegant Kitchens ? Quartz Countertops ? Stainless Steel Appliances ? Panelized Dishwashers ? In-unit washer/dryer ? Floor- to- ceiling windows ? White Oak Flooring ? Mini split heating/cooling system
Bathroom features include ? White Oak Vanities ? Floor-to-ceiling grooved ceramic wall tiles ? Deep soaking tub ? Stone style floor tiles
Our building features ? Laundry room ? Bike Storage ? Resident Lounge ? Business Center ? Kids Playroom ? Fitness Center ? Rooftop Lounge ? Two Outdoor Terraces
Located just south of Highland Park, Cypress Hills is home to passionate individuals who share a strong appreciation for their neighborhood due to its rich and vibrant history, local bars, restaurants, and cafes, and community gardens, parks, and green spaces. Boasting 101 acres, Highland Park is situated on a high plateau and offers stunning views of the Ridgewood Reservoir, Rockaways, and Atlantic Ocean. Additional parks and green spaces include Shirley Chisholm State Park, Hamilton Beach Park, Sperandeo Brothers Playground, the Herbal Garden of East New York, George Walker Jr. Park, Martin Luther King Jr. Playground, Grace Playground, Noakhali Cricket Field, and Sutter Ballfields.

details.description:
The open-plan living and dining area is spacious and airy, with plenty of room for entertaining and relaxation. The kitchen has modern appliances, including a gas stove, refrigerator, and dishwasher, and features plenty of counter and cabinet space.
The bedroom is generously sized, with ample space for a queen-sized bed and other furniture. The bathroom has been recently updated with new fixtures and finishes, including a modern vanity and a shower/tub combo.
The building has a live-in superintendent and offers amenities such as a laundry room and a bike storage area. It is conveniently located near several subway lines, including the 2, 3, 4, and 5 trains, providing easy access to Manhattan and other parts of Brooklyn. There are also many restaurants, bars, and shops in the area, making it a great neighborhood for those who love to explore.

Some of BedStuy's absolute best restaurant, bar, and coffee choices are right here off Bedford-Nostrand! This lively neighborhood will cater to all of your needs and more. With Herbert Von King park just down the street, bodegas on every other corner where they'll know you by name, and beautiful brownstones lining the streets, you get to enjoy the true history and culture of BedStuy, Brooklyn. Not to mention FULL SIZE grocers to both your right and your left, reallyyy upping the NYC convenience level!
Conveniently located right off the G train as well as the B38, B43, B44, and B52 bus routes.
FEATURES: Washer/Dryer IN UNIT! Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen Central A/C and Heat Pet Friendly

amenities.other: Central A/C, Hardwood Floors, Washer/Dryer In Unit

details.description:
Welcome to 1496 Bushwick! This spacious and modern 2-bedroom, 1-bathroom apartment offers a comfortable and stylish living space in the vibrant neighborhood of Bushwick. Situated in a well-maintained building, this unit provides an ideal blend of convenience and contemporary living.
Located in the vibrant neighborhood of Bushwick, this apartment places you in the heart of one of Brooklyn's most dynamic areas. Bushwick is renowned for its artistic flair, eclectic dining options, and lively nightlife scene. Explore the neighborhood's trendy cafes, art galleries, and unique boutiques that line the streets. Enjoy the nearby green spaces, such as Maria Hernandez Park, perfect for leisurely strolls or picnics.
Commuting is a breeze with multiple subway stations and bus routes in close proximity, providing easy access to Manhattan and other parts of Brooklyn. Additionally, the area offers a range of amenities, including supermarkets, pharmacies, and fitness centers, ensuring all your daily needs are met conveniently.
Don't miss the opportunity to call 1496 Bushwick, your new home. Schedule a viewing today and experience the best of Bushwick living in this modern and inviting 2-bedroom apartment!

Check out this spacious 4-bedroom with exposed brick walls, ideal for those craving extra room. Enjoy a generously sized living area boasting impressive 13ft ceilings. Situated just a short stroll from the J, M, and Z Myrtle Ave Train station. Plus, two bedrooms come with built-in loft beds, perfect for maximizing space. Requirements include credit and income verification, with guarantors accepted. Additional features include central air, stainless steel appliances, ample cabinet space, and large closets.

Introducing the Winslow, Astoria?s latest gem and waterfront marvel nestled in the charming Hallets Point neighborhood of Queens
This boutique tower stands as a testament to modern luxury, offering an unparalleled living experience with breathtaking views of both the tranquil waterfront and the iconic New York City skyline. Located in close proximity to buses and the ferry, the Winslow provides convenient access to transportation, ensuring that residents can easily explore the vibrant city beyond. The Winslow sets itself apart with its thoughtfully designed units, boasting spacious layouts, expansive windows, and private balconies in most residences. Revel in the beauty of these homes, featuring meticulously crafted kitchens with high-end appliances and elegantly tiled bathrooms. Each detail has been carefully curated to create a harmonious living space that combines comfort and sophistication.
This premier waterfront tower not only offers stunning residences but also an array of exceptional amenities. Residents can take advantage of convenient parking, secure bike storage, and a dedicated package room. The Winslow goes above and beyond with additional features like a well-equipped gym, game room, and business lounge. The rooftop, adorned with picturesque views and grilling stations, provides the perfect setting for social gatherings. With balconies in most units and a majority enjoying water views, the Winslow promises a lifestyle of tranquility and luxury. As the newest addition to Astoria, a neighborhood known for its proximity to Manhattan coupled with its serene ambiance, the Winslow stands out as a haven of modern living in the heart of the city.

Luxury Apartments at 931 Carroll Street
Welcome to 931 Carroll Street, a brand-new luxury rental building in the heart of Brooklyn. Just a block from the Brooklyn Botanical Gardens and the Brooklyn Museum, and within walking distance of Prospect Park, this location offers an unbeatable blend of culture and nature. Only 2 blocks from the 2, 3, 4, 5 trains and the Shuttle to the A, C, Q trains, you're perfectly positioned for quick access across the city.
Offering studio, 1-bedroom, 2-bedroom, and 3-bedroom apartments, each unit boasts modern design, premium finishes, and oversized windows with stunning views.
Features include: In-unit washer/dryer Dishwasher Hardwood floors Private outdoor space (balcony, courtyard, or patio) Central air and expansive windows for natural light
Building Amenities: State-of-the-art fitness center Landscaped rooftop terrace with panoramic city views Tranquil courtyard for relaxation Garage parking, bike room, and storage options Media room, package room, and pet spa
Live in luxury, surrounded by cultural landmarks and green spaces. With excellent public transportation and nearby shopping and dining options, 931 Carroll Street is your gateway to the best of Brooklyn.

details.description:
Step into this massive 4-bedroom, 4-full-bathroom charmer, boasting exposed brick walls and stunning woodwork throughout!
Features:
- Expansive bedrooms, each fitting a king-size bed and additional furniture with ease - 4 full bathrooms, providing ample space and convenience - Charming exposed brick walls and beautiful woodwork on walls and ceiling - Additional 3 rooms in the basement, perfect for: ? Home offices ? Living spaces ? Creative studios Backyard
- Prime location, just 1 block from the J-M-Z train lines - Bordering East Williamsburg and Bushwick, with Bushwick Avenue just 2 blocks away - Endless shopping, dining, and entertainment options at your doorstep
This incredible property offers unparalleled space, character, and convenience. Perfect for roommates, or entrepreneurs seeking a unique living experience. Schedule a viewing today and make it yours!
